note.p: Birth: Milton Ernest, Bedfordshire, England, Europe (c. January 1641)
Baptism: Milton Ernest, Bedfordshire, England, Europe (25 January 1641)
Burial: Milton Ernest, Bedfordshire, England, Europe (3 October 1672)
Education: St Catharine's College, Cambridge (matriculated 1660); Middle Temple (admitted 1663)
Career: Leased the manor of Milton Ernest to Sir Nathaniel Barnardiston (1662)
Sources: Bulloch's Roll; Hunter; Venn; MT
